author: profd2004
title: Cardano Blockchain Lab in Kenya
description: Although Kenya is at the forefront of technological innovations in the region, Cardano is still scarcely known among the public & Devs.
solution: Extend existing NGO community student hub to add a Cardano Blockchain Lab with dedicated computers, developer mentorship, & community ed.
experience: 14+ Yrs Software & Cloud Engring, Blockchain development, business consulting, world languages, technical writing, teaching, mentored 3 ft .
